segments.text: Many people play sports in China , don't they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Table tennis is probably the most popular .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I expect all Chinese can play table tennis .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you like playing table tennis ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I like . But I can't play it well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Basketball and swimming are very popular .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I like playing basketball , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can play together if you are free .
segments.speaker: S2
